com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurBroadcastMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurBroadcastMessage

  • public class NurBroadcastMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    Params for NUR broadcast message.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bc_cmd
      Command of this filter (NurApi.BC_GET_DEV_INFO, NurApi.BC_GET_ETHCONFIG, NurApi.BC_GET_GPIO, NurApi.BC_SET_ETHCONFIG, NurApi.BC_BEEP).
      int bc_company
      Company ID 0xfe.
      byte[] bc_data
      Command data.
      int bc_devtype
      Device type ID (0x2 = All Nordic ID devices).
      int bc_len
      Command data length.
      int bc_tag
      0xff = message from host to device.
      byte[] f_data
      Filter data.
      int f_op
      Filter operator 1='>' 2='<' 3='=' 4'#'.
      int f_size
      Filter data size.
      int f_type
      Filter type: 0 = No filter, 1 = MAC, 2 = IP, 3 = STATUS, 4 = VERSION, 5 = SERVERPORT, 6 = ADDRTYPE.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bc_tag

        public int bc_tag
        0xff = message from host to device. 0xfe = message from device to host.

      • bc_devtype

        public int bc_devtype
        Device type ID (0x2 = All Nordic ID devices).

      • bc_company

        public int bc_company
        Company ID 0xfe.

      • f_type

        public int f_type
        Filter type: 0 = No filter, 1 = MAC, 2 = IP, 3 = STATUS, 4 = VERSION, 5 = SERVERPORT, 6 = ADDRTYPE.

      • f_op

        public int f_op
        Filter operator 1='>' 2='<' 3='=' 4'#'.

      • f_data

        public byte[] f_data
        Filter data. Max 16 bytes.

      • f_size

        public int f_size
        Filter data size.

      • bc_cmd

        public int bc_cmd
        Command of this filter (NurApi.BC_GET_DEV_INFO, NurApi.BC_GET_ETHCONFIG, NurApi.BC_GET_GPIO, NurApi.BC_SET_ETHCONFIG, NurApi.BC_BEEP).

      • bc_len

        public int bc_len
        Command data length.

      • bc_data

        public byte[] bc_data
        Command data.
